title: Verifying videos of clashes and casualties from Iran protests
description: Latest updates from the BBC's specialists in fact-checking, verifying video and tackling disinformation.
content:
One video shows potentially 200 dead at Tehran mortuary
Benedict Garman, Richard Irvine-Brown and Shayan Sardarizadeh

title: Iran latest: Trump considering action in Iran - as Tehran says 'we are ready for war but also dialogue'
description: Donald Trump says he's considering military action in Iran as rights groups claim more than 500 have been killed in country-wide protests. Tehran's foreign minister has claimed the situation is "under total control". Follow the latest.
content:
Number of dead in Iran rises, human rights group says
The number of dead in Iran continues to rise.
The US-based Human Rights Activists News Agency has confirmed 572 deaths, but there have been suggestions that the true figure is far higher.
The grou... [6725 chars]

title: Man trying to reach island on inflatable mattress rescued from Firth of Forth
description: The man was able to haul himself back onto the mattress after falling into the Firth of Forth and dialled 999.
content:
A man who was attempting to reach an island off the coast of Edinburgh using an inflatable mattress has been rescued after falling into the sea.
RNLI Queensferry Lifeboat said he was using the airbed as a craft to reach Cramond Island in the Firth of... [343 chars]

title: Five decapitated heads displayed on Ecuador beach
description: Bathers found the body parts in Puerto López, a town which has been wracked by gang violence.
content:
Bathers found five decapitated heads displayed on a beach in Ecuador in what appears to be a warning to gang members who have been threatening local fishermen.
The gruesome discovery was made on Sunday on the beachfront in Puerto López, a town which ... [1784 chars]

title: UK set for a 'booming' mortgage market, say analysts
description: Competition among lenders in the UK suggests that rates could be cut in the coming weeks.
content:
Competition among lenders suggests that mortgage rates could be cut in the coming weeks, according to brokers and analysts.
